adHeader: South Bay College Students for Help w/ Moving, Odd Jobs & Errands
adDetails: College Labor (collegelabor.org) is an online marketplace that connects households and business with eager, pre-screened, friendly college students for affordable Moving, Hauling and Errand services in the San Francisco Bay Area We offer a safer, more reliable alternative to most c-list providers at a price well below professional rates. We specialize but are not limited to the following: - Moving: Small Moves, Cross Town Moving, Packing, Unpacking, Moving Truck Loading, Heavy Lifting, In Home/Apt. Building Moving, Truck Rental, etc. - Junk/Donation Hauling: Garbage Disposal, Yard Waste Removal, Junk Removal, Organizing Help, Construction Assistance, etc. - Odd Jobs and Errands: Event Help, Cleaning, Delivery/Pick Up Services, Furniture Assembly, Basic Painting, Gardening Help, Basic Household Help, etc. Get Started by filling out a short application describing your job on our website - https://collegelabor.org (please copy and paste link into your browser) Please email this ad if you have any questions about College Labor, thank you. College Labor Team Follow, friend or read more about us on: - Twitter - Facebook - Linkedin - Pinterest
